summary: A null-datum is the literal value null.
details: Return the value of the constant.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0Atuple Pet (type : String, name : String);%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    var x = %22nil is %22;%0A%0A    (F::print x);%0A%0A    x = null;%0A%0A    (F::print x);%0A}
